mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, CATEGORY, TITLE, IF(LENGTH(IFNULL(ANSWER,''))=0,'N','Y') ANSWER_YN, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE,A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE, B.USER_NAME FROM COUNSEL A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{SEARCH_STR},'%') ORDER BY SEQ
SELECT SEQ, CATEGORY, TITLE, CONTENTS, ANSWER FROM COUNSEL WHERE SEQ = #{SEQ}
UPDATE COUNSEL SET ANSWER = #{ANSWER}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SEQ = #{SEQ}
SELECT A.* ,DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE, '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE_STR FROM USER_INQUIRY A WHERE SEQ = #{SEQ}
UPDATE USER_INQUIRY SET COMPLETE_YN = #{COMPLETE_YN}, MEMO = #{MEMO}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SEQ = #{SEQ}
